backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, tasks, lists, routines, payroll structures, spend tracking, and authorization mixin, including all related types and initial state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI change for Plan mode's X button and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/docs/task-toggle-audit.md: Audit documenting latency causes in task completion toggling and recommending optimistic updates to improve responsiveness.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying name, icons, colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, activation cleanup, and network-first fetch strategy with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing theme context, rendering TaskManager, toast system, and offline indicator.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dialog listing users with search, pagination, and actions to promote or demote admins.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapLoa: Loading screen component shown during authentication/bootstrap with a spinner and simple message.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Bottom navigation bar handling mode switching, Plan mode X behavior, long-press detection, and task/list action buttons.
frontend/src/components/CreateListDialog: Modal form for creating a new list with name input and loading state.
frontend/src/components/CustomLists.tsx: Displays and manages custom task lists with drag-and-drop, task actions, and list creation or deletion.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s fields including title, description, list assignment, and flags.
frontend/src/components/EisenhowerMatrix: Renders the Eisenhower Matrix with draggable quadrant tasks and optional plan mode.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing attribution and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing logo, date, theme toggle, user menu, and admin access.
frontend/src/components/InsightsDialog.t: Analytics dialog showing spend charts, balance status, and time‑period filtering.
frontend/src/components/MorningRoutine.t: Component for displaying, adding, editing, reordering, and deleting morning or evening routine items with long‑press reorder and display mode toggling.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows a fullscreen offline notice when the browser is offline and hides it when reconnected.
frontend/src/components/PayrollHistoryDi: Dialog that lists payroll history, supports editing and submitting payroll records, and formats dates and totals.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Dialog for configuring monetary settings and toggling the earnings system with validation and proportional value adjustments.
Dialog for creating, confirming, deleting spend items and managing spend presets with category and amount inputs.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Task card with drag‑and‑drop and touch‑based long‑press editing, supporting completion, editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button toggling between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/TodayEarnsDialog: Computes daily earnings from tasks and routines and submits payroll, displaying results in a dialog with history access.
frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedS: Shows a marketing-style login screen with app features and a button to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/UniversalAddTask: Provides a dialog to create new tasks, supporting quadrant-based or custom lists with prediction logic and form handling.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Displays a profile setup form allowing users to enter their name and save a new profile via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and returns a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks to manage Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profile, admin actions, app mode, and other data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom layers defining color variables, dark mode theme, and UI animations such as streak effects.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local task/list types with helper converters between backend and local React-friendly structures.
frontend/src/lib/userTier.ts: Maps backend user tier enums to display labels like Basic, Silver, Gold, and Diamond.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManager.tsx: Main task management page orchestrating authentication, queries, dialogs, and UI state for tasks, routines, and settings.
frontend/src/utils/dragPayload.ts: Utility for writing and reading stable drag-and-drop payloads using custom and fallback MIME types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom color variables, animations, plugins, and responsive design settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, high-level app summary, and a list of implemented features covering authentication, actor setup, secret handling, RBAC, and admin operations.
